function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integrating strong and holistic ecosystem perspectives","Impact":"Ineffective disease containment and propagation control","Mitigation":"Incorporate ecosystem perspectives into disease control strategies","Technologies":"Ecosystem monitoring and analysis tools","People":"Global health stakeholders, policymakers, and disease control experts","Owner":"Health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in fostering sustainable transformations in the absence of addressing overarching socio-economic structural conditions","Impact":"Inability to achieve sustainable disease control and prevention","Mitigation":"Address socio-economic structural conditions for sustainable transformations","Technologies":"Social and economic development programs","People":"Communities, policymakers, and social development agencies","Owner":"Government agencies and international development organizations"},{"Description":"Relative policy neglect for large-scale implementation of participatory approaches","Impact":"Failure to effectively implement community participation in disease control","Mitigation":"Establish and prioritize policy frameworks for large-scale participatory approaches","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms and policy development tools","People":"Global health policymakers and community leaders","Owner":"Government agencies and global health organizations"}]}
